free: #e There is a story which I would say.
#e Another is pulling the goat：Another one is sheepping the goat.
#c 另一個在拉著羊：另一個在放羊。
#e When the old man was harvesting the pomelo, a young man rode a bike passing by.
#c 當這老爺爺在採柚子的時候，有一個年輕人騎單車經過。
#n yacengecenge ka langukathabarane 青壯年的年輕人，此為完整用法。
#e When (old man) did not notice, (the young man) take one basket and put it up.
#c 當(老人)沒有注意到時，(年輕人)就把一籃拿走放上去。
#e He put this in the bicycle and leave.
#e When he is leaving, there is (a person) coming to meet him.
#c 當他離開的時候，有(個人)正在過來跟他碰面。
#e Then, when meeting，he want to see this person firstly.
#c 然後當碰面的時候，(他)想先看(這個人)。
#e (When) they are passing each other, his hats fells and then he traps and bumps his bicycle against a stone.
#c (當)互相經過時，然後他的帽子掉了，然後碰到石頭拐到了他的腳踏車然後跌倒。
#e When (he) is falling，the one that he steal scatters.
#c 當(他)跌倒的時候，然後他偷的那一(籃)就散落了。
#e Then, there are three people coming.
#e One child is mixed (in)，and then there are two young mans.
#c 混了一個小孩，然後有兩個年輕人。
#e Then, (they) help this woman to pick up this pomelo.
#c 然後，(他們)先幫忙這個女生撿這個柚子。
#e Then (they) picked up this pomelo, and then take…
#c 然後(他們)撿完這柚子，然後拿…。
#e Then, this girl wants to leave.
#e Then, (they) take this hat and go firstly to give this (girl) who fall for the good of their heart.
#c 然後(他們)拿這帽子而且先去給這個摔倒過(的女孩)因為他們的善心。

gloss: 名物化-自身-重疊-說-名物化
free: #e This, for the sake of this story.
#e If human do this, they would encounter hardship；say, see the woman and man.
#c 人如果這樣做的話，就會遭到苦難，(我)說，你看那個女生(跟)男生。
#e (They) steal the taking of the old man，and then fall.
#c (他們)偷了這老人在採的東西，然後跌倒了。
#e When (they) fall like this, the three young man say “why this hat of the girl drops” and leave.
#c 當(他們)跌倒變成這樣時，這三個年輕的男生因為他們的心很善良，然後說這女孩的帽子怎麼掉了就這樣說就離開。

gloss: 名物化-使役-自身-像-名物化=3SG.數格
free: #e (This) gives a lesson to this girl and that boy, the old man did not think that it would be like this.
#c (這件事)給了這個女孩還有那個男孩，這老人沒有想到它會像這樣。
#n 本句發音人亦無法完全確定語意，需再檢查。
#e When this old man comes down, they take this pomelo.
#c 當這老人下來的時候，(他們)很快地把柚子拿走了。
#e The old man is surprise and say “where is my pomelo?”
#c (老人)很驚訝然後說「我採的(柚子)在哪裡？」
#e This three young man are passing and helping this girl.
#c 這三個年輕人正在經過，幫助這女孩。
#e Then, (it is) like the story I say.
#c 然後像我說的這個故事。
#e This is what I learned: people would be poor if they do bad things.
#c 人如果做壞事會很可憐，這是我學到的。
#e These three men is telling this girl another (way) to be a human.
#c 這三個男士告訴這女孩另一(種)做人的(道理)。
#n 本句發音人也無法確定真實語意為何。
#e This is exactly the story I want to say.
#n abubulru 跟 abulru 都有故事的意涵，但前者有傳說的意味存在。
#e From the old man is taking pomelo，there is that crime of other.
#c 從這個老人採柚子，就有他人犯罪。
#e The one who makes a crime will not have good luck
#c 犯罪者不會有好運氣，也不會先幫忙。
#n 此處句式混亂，發音人翻譯上有困難。
#e His hat which dropped is return firstly.

gloss: 名物化-放-KI-重疊-心-名物化

free: #e (Another thing) should be put in mind is exactly that his personality will make crimes.
#c 另一件要放在心上(的事)就是說他的個性會犯罪。
#n 此句發音人無法完全保證是對的，需再確認。
#e (This is) what I left to say.
